The variadic/to_tuple.hpp header defines a variadic macro that converts variadic data to a tuple.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/variadic/to_tuple.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_VARIADIC_TO_TUPLE (v)
